page.title: 14SPORTS & RECREATIONS.
page.content: {A report by Paul Coppard. Here is a list of the adult sport clubs in Barcombe: Cricket,Football, Stoolball, Tennis and Bowls. We did a local survey and found out the popular family sports and recreations in Barcombe.These are: Football {*********** }(*=1FAMILY) Cricket {****** Rugby {** Hockey {* Bowls {***** Tennis {********** Stoolball {********** Running {******** Swimming {*************** Badminton {** Television{********************** Gardening {*************************** D.I.Y. {****************** Fishing {************* Spectating Sports{***********
